::Rodimus Prime/Kup::

Rodimus and Kup high five each other as the Sweeps fall. Their attention is then diverted to Cyclonus.

As the Sweeps lash out at Kup he opens up a volley of laser rifle fire before diving back under the surface to avoid the attacks. He has to dive deep to avoid the powerful cannon shots so it will take him a moment to return to the surface.

Rodimus ignores the Sweeps as he stares down Cyclonus eye to eye. The voice chilled him. It was the same. He couldn't tell if this was the same Cyclonus from the Great War but the voice was the same and it scared him. Now was the time to be the brave leader.

Rodimus: Cyclonus, if you know anything about me then you should know that threats will not change my resolve. I am an Autobot. I have spent thousands of years facing evil in the universe and I do not back down from it. The Maximals will be willing to die to protect the Matrix from Unicron. There is no way I'll ever hand it over. You want it so bad then you call off the attack. We go to a deserted area and fight it out. Now if you are the same Cyclonus I knew then you will be to coward to agree. Are you?!

Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:                               
 OOC: If I have forgotten anyone or missed anything let me know. I like
 to catch it all, but there are a lot of details. I apologize in
 advance.
 
 BIC:
 
 The air is becoming positively filled with the acrid smell of laser
 fire and the bite of acid. The skies above are still thick with sweeps,
 but for those keeping count, the number of them is beginning to
 diminish. Whatever the various defenders are doing it is beginning to
 take its toll on the minions. But so far their onslaught continues
 without let up!
 
 Sweeps around the base continue a holding pattern above and beyond the
 door, either out of range or the field of view of the door�s cannons
 and defenders. They continue concentrating firepower around the base,
 their heavy lasers and disintegration beams bathing its shields in
 scintillating colors. Blasts from Guardia and the gate guards continue
 to keep the sweeps at bay, and even succeed in bringing down a few. As
 a result the sweeps redouble thier efforts to stay out of the direct
 line of fire and attempt to harass anyone trying to leave through the
 doors. (OOC: No the sweeps are not at the doors, but anyone trying to
 come out may have to face their firepower from an oblique angle. The
 sweeps may not be able to totally block the door, but they can make
 exits difficult. IE: people should be able to leave, but should pose
 having to dodge cannon fire and such) 
 
 As for Salveo, his scans for any other minions other than the ones in
 the air, or otherwise already accounted for come up negative. However
 as far as most of his sensors are concerned the sweeps are not there,
 only infrared picks up a slight vapor trail from their exhaust when
 they engage engines in heavy thrust, or visual cameras as they pan over
 their fields of view. 
 
 Somewhat nearby:
 
 Several sweeps go up in an amazing blast of fire and pyrotechnics as
 Lord Perseus' long black rifle lights into the air. Several charred and
 smoking frames fall from the skies and hit the streets below! For the
 rest of the sweeps the reaction is swift as they swing away from the
 fortifications for a moment and circle around trying to find an
 opening. For the moment Perseus� immediate area is free, however the
 walls of his fortification still rumble and debris continue to fall
 around him as laser fire targets his location from sides he cannot yet
 defend! 
 
 In the air above:
 
 Cyclonus turned away from Ravenchief�s as the Maximal fell away from
 him, the expression on his face giving no hint to his inner thoughts.
 Instead he turns his attention to his true prey ...   
 
 On the streets below:
  
 As Ravenchief pulls himself out of his fall and swings up, two sweeps
 move in his direction led by a slightly larger one. �Ahhhh, so we meet
 again. I have come to return the favor!� Laughter rings out as laser
 fire opens up from Scourge and soon enough from the sweeps beside him.
 (OOC: I know Windlord is in route, but not sure how close he is)
 Near the waters:
 
 At the water below:
 
 Below near the water the combined firepower of Kup, Doc and Rodimus
 Prime are enough to finish off the few remaining sweeps that menace
 them. Sending several smoking and charred wrecks to a wet grave beneath
 the ocean waves. 
 
 However their respite is short indeed as Cyclonus and nearly a half a
 dozen sweeps move over the railing floating down to the waterfront,
 perhaps the very sweeps that scattered to avoid Cyclonus� earlier
 missile attack have returned. Now they circled Cyclonus, like air bourn
 lions waiting for the command to attack! 
 
 Cyclonus looks down, and with a gesture from him the Sweeps swirled
 forward, their cannons lashing out at Doc and Kup, even as Cyclonus
 continued is decent. 
 
 �Rodimus Prime!� The old timber of Cyclonus� voice resonated against
 the cliff walls. �You have only one choice ahead of you now.� 
 
 Perhaps this is the same Cyclonus of old, perhaps not, but as he
 descended, the very power he radiated showed something there was
 something newa bout him. This is NOT the Cyclonus that served under
 Galvatron. The reformat he and Scourge had undergone changed them
 somehow, and it is as if Cyclonus has been fully unleashed, and finally
 brought to his fullest potential. 
 
 His voice deepened as he continued, �You will give me the Matrix now,
 or I will lay waste to you and this entire city and take it from your
 smoking frame!�
